appDesc.message: Speed dial 2 is fast and clean extension for your favorite pages and quick access to your apps, bookmarks and browsing history.

apps_do_you_want_to_uninstall.message: Do you realy want to uninstall selected application?

help_take_tour_help.message:
Please take a minute to learn about basics of Speed Dial 2.
It will help you to understand its possibilities and allow you to easily
get around with different settings and customizations!

help_tour.message: Take the tour of extension's features!

new_tab_enter_group_name.message: Please enter a new group name

newtab_dial_remove_warning.message: Do you really want to remove this dial?

newtab_group_remove_warning.message:
This will remove selected group with all dials inside it.
Do you wish to continue?

options_apps_show_panel_help.message:
You can show your installed Apps in standalone panel
or list your Apps in sidebar (see also Sidebar section).

options_background_file_warning.message: Because of special way how Chrome handles local files, using this feature is highly not recommended. Background images loaded from your computer will result in much higher memory usage (possibly hundreds of megabytes of RAM) and will slow down overal loading time of Speed Dial 2 as well as overal performance of Your browser! We recommend that you use some of image hosting services like

options_background_image_service.message: You can use image hosting provider like

options_background_leave_empty.message: Leave empty for no background image

options_background_patterns_from.message: All these great patterns comes from

options_export_export_help.message: This section allows you to easily import/export your dials and setting to another computer. To export and backup your setting click Export settings button and copy all of generated text that appears.

options_export_exported_settings_help.message: copy and paste through 'Import settings' button to use on different PC.

options_export_import_help.message: To import your setting, press Import settings button and paste settings you previously saved. Note that importing your settings will erase all your dials and saved options!

options_export_paste_help.message: you previously exported through 'Export settings' button

options_export_warning.message: Warning: This will wipe all your settings and dials and replace them with ones included in imported settings. If you are a Pro user, these groups and bookmarks will replace existing bookmarks on our server. Do you wish to continue?

options_options_columns_help.message: Number of dials to be shown in one row. Number of rows is calculated automatically according to overal number of saved dials.

options_options_highlight_pages_help.message: Speedial2 keeps track of your daily habits and remembers which pages do you visit in the morning, afternoon, evening and night. By turning on this option, you should see a red corner on 3 pages you visit often at current part of a day.

options_options_open_in_new_tab_help.message: Turn on to open all links in new tab. If turned on, middle click or Ctrl+click will open links in current tab instead of new tab.

options_options_order_dials_help.message: Dials can be ordered automatically by number of visits or by your own manual order. If you choose to order pages manually, you can drag them to change their position.

options_options_remember_group_help.message: Option to remember and open last used group on new launch.

options_options_scroll_layout_help.message: Scroll dials infinitely instead focing them to fit on screen.

options_options_thumbnail_quality_help.message: We recommend setting HIGH QUALITY for less than 10 dials, MEDIUM quality for 10-20 thumbnails and LOW quality for > 20 thumbnails.Please keep in mind that thumbnail quality also determines loading time of a new tab.

options_sidebar_access_by_mouse.message: Entering the right side of the screen

options_sync_access_devices.message: Works with any mobile device - mobile phones and tablets

options_sync_access_devices_1.message: Works with mobile phones and tablets.

options_sync_become_pro_3.message: and pay for your Speed Dial 2 Pro with

options_sync_become_pro_4.message:
Finally, enter your username
and password at the top of this page.

options_sync_connection_error.message: There was an error while connecting to server

options_sync_error.message: There was an error while importing your settings.

options_sync_how_it_works_1.message: With Speed Dial Pro, you bookmarks and settings are being automatically synchronized to our server

options_sync_how_it_works_2.message: This means your extension with all dials, groups and settings will be synchronized across different computers right after you provide you sync creditials (username and password). Synchronization with our server takes place every time you start a browser and any other changes (creating new bookmarks or group) are immediatelly replicated online.

options_sync_love.message: If you like Speed Dial 2, you’ll love to have it in your pocket!

options_sync_not_active.message: Your sync account is not active. Please log in to activate it.

options_sync_online_access_1.message: Since your groups and bookmarks will be available online, you can access them from any other browser or mobile device by logging in at

options_sync_online_access_2.message: They're optimized to be viewed on mobile devices and tablets as well as desktop computers. To quickly access your bookmarks from your mobile device, set Speed Dial 2 as a homepage or pin it as a bookmark on your Homescreen.

options_sync_wait.message: Please wait for synchronization to complete...

statistics_loading_message.message: Please wait while we analyze your browsing history.

welcome_10_1.message:
According to your browsing history we've found that
these are websites you visit most often.
Would you like to import them to Speed dial 2?

welcome_10_2.message: Please wait while we analyze your browsing history. The process can take a minute.

welcome_10_5.message:
You can optionally select which websites to import
by checking/unchecking checkboxes.

welcome_11_1.message:
We wish you a lot of
great experience with our extension

welcome_11_2.message: Follow a guy who made this

welcome_12_1.message: Show list of installed applications in Sidebar.

welcome_12_2.message: We haven't found any installed applications in your browser.

welcome_12_3.message: We've found applications in your browser.

welcome_1_2.message:
Please take a minute to learn about basics of Speed Dial 2.
It will help you to understand its possibilities and allow you to easily
get around with different settings and customizations!

welcome_1_3.message: It will take just a minute.

welcome_2_1.message:
The most important things around here are called dials,
visual bookmarks of your favorite websites.

welcome_2_2.message: You can keep as many dials as you want or even organize them into different groups.

welcome_2_3.message: The only information you need to know in order to create new dial is its URL. You can customize each dial with your own image, one of predefined logos or you just visit the page for the first time and we will capture its thumbnail.

welcome_3_1.message:
Now how can you create new dial?
It's really easy and you can even do it by three different ways (shown at the picture above).

welcome_3_2.message: Clicking the plus button will open a dialog for creating new dial.

welcome_3_3.message: Right-click on empty space while having your extension open and select Add dial from the menu which appears. You can get to Options, Statistics and Help section from the same menu as well.

welcome_3_4.message: Add new dial directly while you're browsing - let's say you're visiting apple.com. If you wish to keep it in speed dial, right-click anywhere on the page and select Speed dial 2 » Add curent page from Chrome's context menu.

welcome_4_1.message: To change settings of a dial - just right-click on it and select Edit from a context menu.

welcome_4_2.message: You can remove a dial the same way - just select Remove instead of Edit.

welcome_5_1.message: To change settings of a dial - just right-click on it and select Edit from a context menu.

welcome_5_2.message:
You can modify title of a dial, its logo and url address,
place it in a different group of create a new one.

welcome_6_1.message:
Sidebar is a special feature of our extension - it provides you with access to your
Recently closed tabs, list of installed applications from Chrome Web Store,
your Google Chrome bookmarks or even bookmarks and tags from delicious.com
- You can turn specific sidebar features on and off in options.

welcome_6_2.message:
Please note that sidebar is hidden by default!
It only shows up when you navigate your mouse near right edge of browser screen.

welcome_6_3.message: Access sidebar by navigating your mouse to the right edge of the screen.

welcome_9_1.message:
Please keep in mind that Speed dial 2 is
not just ordinary new tab replacement - you can
turn it into a powerful tool and customize it to look like

welcome_9_note_1.message: A beautiful startpage, a place where you keep your most favorite websites.

welcome_9_note_11.message:
If you want to organize your favorite websites a better way - simply put them into different groups.
Keep even hundreds of favorite websites - neatly organized into categories.

welcome_9_note_12.message:
... or if you like to keep it simple, turn all the features off
and enjoy your beautiful and minimalistic new tab page.

welcome_9_note_13a.message:
There's a lot of different options that hasn't been introduced - we would like
to encourage you to explore them by yourself and turn our extension into
something that works for you the best way. All the customization can be made in Options.

welcome_9_note_13b.message:
New features are already in development and the other ones
will be coming gradually - please feel free to share your experience
or leave your suggestions at our

welcome_9_note_3.message: ... with access to your bookmars and browsing history ...

welcome_9_note_6.message: ... or even your tags and bookmarks from delicious.com ...

welcome_thanks.message: Thank you for installing our extension!
